Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, north of the Elven Embassy.
Room.LongDescription: Since Oceancrest is primarily a human town, sometimes, some of the other races which inhabit Oceancrest feel like their needs are not being fully addressed. The Elven Embassy to the south provides a voice for the elven people to the government. It also connects communications lines between Oceancrest and other elven cities.
